title: Psycho
description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

title: The Birds
description: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people.

title: Rear Window
description: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

title: Vertigo
description: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

title: North by Northwest
description: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

title: Dial M for Murder
description: A tennis player frames his unfaithful wife for first-degree murder after she inadvertently hinders his plan to kill her.

title: To Catch a Thief
description: A retired jewel thief sets out to prove his innocence after being suspected of returning to his former occupation.

title: Marnie
description: A troubled woman is plagued by a series of personal conflicts which ultimately leads to a dramatic confrontation with her boss.

title: The Trouble with Harry
description: The trouble with Harry is that he's dead, and everyone seems to have a different idea of what should be done with his body.

title: Frenzy
description: A serial killer is murdering women with a necktie, and a London ex-convict who was just released from prison becomes the prime suspect in the killings.
